summary: 2 buddy farmers are visited by aliens who like their domestic cabbage soup.
cast: Louis de Funès|Jean Carmet|Jacques Villeret|Claude Gensac|Henri Génès|Marco Perrin|Christine Dejoux|Gaëlle Legrand|Catherine Ohotnikoff|Philippe Ruggieri|Philippe Brizard|Max Montavon|Thierry Liagre|Perrette Souplex|Carole Nugue|Jean-Pierre Rambal|Inge Offerman
title: Mi amigo el extraterrestre
